statements: SELECT * FROM Vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email, phone_number FROM Vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, email FROM Vendors WHERE platform_access = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Vendors WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_person FROM Vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, email, phone_number FROM Vendors WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number FROM Vendors WHERE platform_access = TRUE AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM Vendors WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM Vendors WHERE vendor_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY vendor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM communication WHERE sender_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message FROM communication WHERE receiver_id = 5;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location IN ('New York', 'California') ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location = 'California' AND contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT c.sender_id, c.receiver_id, c.message, v.vendor_name FROM communication c JOIN vendors v ON c.sender_id = v.vendor_id ORDER BY c.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_contact_person FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM documents WHERE vendor_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_contact_person IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) as total_documents FROM vendors JOIN documents ON vendors.vendor_id = documents.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name ORDER BY total_documents DESC;
SELECT communications.timestamp, vendors.vendor_name, communications.message FROM communications JOIN vendors ON communications.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id ORDER BY communications.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = '123456-789';
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT vendor_id, contact_person FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT vendor_name, email, phone_number FROM vendors
SELECT communication_id, vendor_id, timestamp, message FROM communications ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendors WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT vendor_name, email, contact_person FROM vendors JOIN communications ON vendors.vendor_id = communications.vendor_id
SELECT vendor_name, email, message FROM vendors INNER JOIN communications USING(vendor_id) WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE vendor_id = 1 ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM contacts WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors
SELECT * FROM communication WHERE vendor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT doc_name, doc_content FROM documents WHERE vendor_id = 2 AND doc_name LIKE '%sample%'
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM contacts WHERE vendor_id = 3
SELECT vendor_name, status FROM vendors JOIN issues ON vendors.vendor_id = issues.vendor_id
